titleStmt.title: The faithful covenanter. A sermon preached at the lecture in Dedham in Essex. By that excellent servant of Iesus Christ, in the work of the Gospel, Mr. Tho. Hooker, late of Chelmsford; now in New England. Very usefull in these times of covenanting with God.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The last 4 in the imprint date is crossed out; "Jan: 10th 1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
